title: 62 - 3 Views Of The Reality Of Hell - Guest Preston Sprinkle
description:
In this episode we invite Dr. Preston Sprinkle to share with us an expanded conversation on 3 views of the reality of hell.

4 Views of Hell (Second Edition): https://www.amazon.com/Four-Views-Hell-Counterpoints-Theology/dp/0310516463
Website: www.prestonsprinkle.com
Theology in the Raw Podcast: https://t.co/4PaWWpp36r

- Mike Erre

**DISCLAIMER: I (andy) at the end of the show said that the Anaheim Ducks are currently #1 in the NHL. What I meant to say is #1 in the Pacific Division, we are currently not #1 in the NHL, yet. :)
